Package BusinessLogicPackage

Class ClientBLL

java.lang.Object
BusinessLogicPackage.ClientBLL
public class ClientBLL extends Object
This class is a BLL Class (Business Logic Layer) It will contain the Business Logic for the operations on client objects.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientBLL

      public ClientBLL()
      The class constructor.

  • Method Details

    • findClientById

      public Client findClientById​(int id)
      This method call the findById method from ClientDAO class, for searching a client with client id = param id. It also validates the result of the method called.
      Parameters:
      id - is the client id of the client we are looking for in the database.
      Returns:
      the client with the id or an exception if the client was not found.

    • findAll

      public List<Client> findAll()
      This method call the findAll method from ClientDAO class, for searching all the clients in the database. It also validates the result of the method called.
      Returns:
      a list of clients from database or an exception if the table is empty.

    • insert

      public Client insert​(Client t)
      This method call the insert method from ClientDAO class, for inserting a client in the database. It also validates the client input before calling the method and the result of the method called.
      Parameters:
      t - is the client which we want to insert in the database.
      Returns:
      the client which was inserted in the database or an exception if the client has not been inserted.

    • update

      public Client update​(Client t)
      This method call the update method from ClientDAO class, for updating a client from database. It also validates the client input before calling the method and the result of the method called.
      Parameters:
      t - is the client which we want to update.
      Returns:
      the client which was updated in the database or an exception if the client has not been updated.

    • delete

      public Client delete​(Client t)
      This method call the delete method from ClientDAO class, for deleting a client from database. It also deletes if exists the client's orders from database and validates the result of the method called.
      Parameters:
      t - is the client which we want to delete.
      Returns:
      the client which was deleted in the database or an exception if the client has not been deleted.
